attributes.action: Stop charging people to park at areas of natural beauty in the UK countryside. The government needs to make all areas of the UK countryside available for people to enjoy , excercise, appreciate and spend time with the family free of charge. The parking restrictions put a limit on the time people can spend, the government should make it freely available for an unlimited time period to all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Areas of natural beauty in the South East such as Ditchling Beacon, Ardingly Reservouir and Beachy Head have been given parking metres by the council. This situation may be the same in other areas. Up until a few years ago these areas were free for all to enjoy. Now parking is being charged and a maximum parking time applied. This stops people from walking care free as they now have to worry about getting back in time for the parking ticket. These areas are our heritage and should be free for all to enjoy. Not only are we now being charged, but a parking warden is also being paid out of tax payers money to police these areas. 'It's a free country!', well not any more, but it should be free for everyone to enjoy...
